channel.title: XJ Info and DIYs on Eddie Abbondanzio

item.title: How to Piece Together a 2" Old Man Emu Lift
item.description: Old Man Emu is a great choice for lifting your XJ, but hunting down the correct part numbers can be difficult. I spent the last couple weeks DIYing a lift for my second XJ so I figured I’d post up everything I found.
